00017 float ArabCalc::Calculate(){
00018         float hasil;
00019         if(mode == 1)
00020         {
00021                 hasil = CalculatePrefix();
00022         }
00023         else if(mode == 2)
00024         {
00025                 hasil = CalculateInfix();
00026         }
00027         if(mode == 3)
00028         {
00029                 hasil = CalculatePostfix();
00030         }
00031         return hasil;
00032 }

00034 float ArabCalc::CalculatePrefix(){
00035         char buffer[15], buffer2[15];
00036         int i, j, len;
00037         float op1, op2, x;
00038         j = 0;
00039         len = this->ekspresi.length();
00040         for(i=len-1;i>=0;i--){
00041                 if((ekspresi[i] >= '0' && ekspresi[i]<='9') || ekspresi[i]=='.'){
00042                         buffer[j++] = ekspresi[i];
00043                 }
00044                 else if(ekspresi[i]==' '){
00045                         if(j>0){
00046                                 int n =j-1;
00047                                 int k;
00048                 for(k = 0; k < j; k++){
00049                                         buffer2[k]=buffer[n];
00050                                         cout << buffer2[k]<<endl;
00051                                         n--;
00052                 }
00053                 buffer2[k+1] = '\0';
00054                 x = atof(buffer2);
00055                                 this->bil << x;
00056                                 j = 0;
00057                         }
00058                 }
00059                 else if(ekspresi[i]=='+' || ekspresi[i]=='-' || ekspresi[i]=='*' || ekspresi[i]==':' || ekspresi[i]=='%' || ekspresi[i]=='/'){
00060                         this->operatorx << ekspresi.substr(i,1);
00061                         SmallCalculate(bil, operatorx);
00062                 }
00063         }
00064         x = bil.getLastData();
00065         return x;
00066 }

00068 float ArabCalc::CalculateInfix(){
00069         string dumpoperator;
00070         float dumpbil;
00071         float hasil;
00072         string ekspresitemp = ekspresi;
00073         while(ekspresitemp.length() != 0)
00074         {
00075                 char *temp =  new char[30];
00076                 int isCompleteRead = 0;
00077                 int ctemp = 0;
00078                 while(ekspresitemp[0] == '0' || ekspresitemp[0] == '1' || ekspresitemp[0] == '2' || ekspresitemp[0] == '3' || ekspresitemp[0] == '4' || ekspresitemp[0] == '5'
00079                 || ekspresitemp[0] == '6'|| ekspresitemp[0] == '7' || ekspresitemp[0] == '8' || ekspresitemp[0] == '9' || ekspresitemp[0] == '.')
00080                 {
00081                         temp[ctemp] = ekspresitemp[0];
00082                         ekspresitemp.erase(0,1);
00083                         ctemp++;
00084                         isCompleteRead = 1;
00085                 }
00086                 if(isCompleteRead == 1)
00087                 {
00088                         bil<< atof(temp);
00089                 }
00090                 if(ekspresitemp[0] == '+' || ekspresitemp[0] == '-' || ekspresitemp[0] == '*' || ekspresitemp[0] == ':' || ekspresitemp[0] == '/' || ekspresitemp[0] == '%' || ekspresitemp[0] == '('|| ekspresitemp[0] == ')')
00091                 {
00092                         if(operatorx.isEmpty() || ekspresitemp[0] == '(')
00093                         {
00094                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00095 
00096                         }
00097                         else
00098                         {
00099                                 if(ekspresitemp[0] == '+' || ekspresitemp[0] == '-')
00100                                 {
00101                                         if(operatorx.getLastData() == "*" || operatorx.getLastData() == ":"|| operatorx.getLastData() == "/" || operatorx.getLastData() == "%" || operatorx.getLastData() == "+" || operatorx.getLastData() == "-")
00102                                         {
00103                                                 SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00104                                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00105                                         }
00106                                         else
00107                                         {
00108                                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00109 
00110                                         }
00111                                 }
00112                                 else if(ekspresitemp[0] == '*' || ekspresitemp[0] == '/' || ekspresitemp[0] == '%' || ekspresitemp[0] == ':')
00113                                 {
00114 
00115                                         if(operatorx.getLastData() == "*" || operatorx.getLastData() == "/" || operatorx.getLastData() == ":"  || operatorx.getLastData() == "%")
00116                                         {
00117                                                 SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00118                                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00119                                         }
00120                                         else
00121                                         {
00122                                                 operatorx<<ekspresitemp.substr(0,1);
00123                                         }
00124                                 }
00125                                 else if(ekspresitemp[0] == ')')
00126                                 {
00127                                         while(operatorx.getLastData() != "(")
00128                                         {
00129                                                 SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00130                                         }
00131                                         operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00132                                 }
00133 
00134                         }
00135                         ekspresitemp.erase(0,1);
00136                 }
00137         }
00138         while(!operatorx.isEmpty())
00139         {
00140                 SmallCalculate(bil,operatorx);
00141 
00142         }
00143         hasil = bil.getLastData();
00144         //Cleaning
00145         while(!bil.isEmpty())
00146         {
00147                 bil>>dumpbil;
00148         }
00149         while(!operatorx.isEmpty())
00150         {
00151                 operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00152         }
00153         return hasil;
00154 }

00156 float ArabCalc::CalculatePostfix(){
00157         char buffer[15];
00158         int i, j; //iterator
00159         float op1, op2, x; //operand dan hasil
00160         char opr; //operator
00161         j = 0;
00162         int len; // panjang ekspresi
00163         len = this->ekspresi.length();
00164         for(i=0; i<len;i++){
00165                 if((ekspresi[i] >= '0' && ekspresi[i]<='9') || ekspresi[i] == '.'){
00166                         buffer[j++] = ekspresi[i];
00167                 }
00168                 else if(ekspresi[i]==' '){
00169                         if(j>0){
00170                                 buffer[j]='\0';
00171                                 x = atoi(buffer);
00172                                 this->bil << x;
00173                                 j = 0;
00174                         }
00175                 }
00176                 else if(ekspresi[i]=='+' || ekspresi[i]=='-' || ekspresi[i]=='*' || ekspresi[i]==':' || ekspresi[i]=='%' || ekspresi[i]=='/'){
00177                         this->operatorx << ekspresi.substr(i,1);
00178                         SmallCalculate(bil, operatorx);
00179                         }
00180                 }
00181     x = bil.getLastData();
00182         return x;
00183 }

00185 void ArabCalc::SmallCalculate(Stack<float> &bil,Stack<string> &operatorx)
00186 {
00187         float popbil1;
00188         float popbil2;
00189         string dumpoperator;
00190         float dumpbil;
00191         popbil1 = bil.getLastData();
00192         bil>>dumpbil;
00193         popbil2 = bil.getLastData();
00194         bil>>dumpbil;
00195         string popoperator = operatorx.getLastData();
00196         operatorx>>dumpoperator;
00197         if(popoperator == "*")
00198         {
00199                 bil<< popbil2*popbil1;
00200         }
00201         else if(popoperator == ":")
00202         {
00203                 bil<< popbil2/popbil1;
00204         }
00205         else if(popoperator == "/")
00206         {
00207                 int a = (int) floor(popbil2/popbil1 + 0.5);
00208                 bil<< a;
00209         }
00210         else if(popoperator == "%")
00211         {
00212                 int tempint1 = (int) floor(popbil1 + 0.5);
00213                 int tempint2 = (int) floor(popbil2 + 0.5);
00214                 float hasil = (float)(tempint2%tempint1);
00215                 bil<< hasil;
00216         }
00217 
00218         else if(popoperator == "+")
00219         {
00220                 bil<< popbil2+popbil1;
00221         }
00222         else if(popoperator == "-")
00223         {
00224                 bil<< popbil2-popbil1;
00225         }
00226 }
